features: Body Gel CREAM: Neutrogena hydro boost body gel cream is fragrance-free and infused with hyaluronic acid to instantly nourish thirsty skin; Neutrogena is the #1 selling facial skincare brand

Sensitive SKIN: The hydro boost body gel cream is made with an ultra-light formula and powered by hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin that locks in needed moisture and is suitable for sensitive skin

BENEFITS: Neutrogena hydrating body cream is clinically proven to make your skin feel smooth and moisturized without feeling greasy; results in healthier and younger looking skin; fragrance-free formula and free of parabens, oils, and alcohol
HOW To USE: Lightweight body gel cream that can be incorporated into your daily skincare routine; fast-absorbing and lightweight formula that boosts hydration; apply generously to dry skin as needed

INCLUDES: Pack of 1, 16 oz. body lotion; developed by dermatologists for normal to dry skin; continued use of a hyaluronic acid body gel cream improves dry skin over time by continuing to retain needed hydration
body.description: Neutrogena Fragrance-Free Hydro Boost Body Gel Cream instantly quenches thirsty skin. Designed for daily use on dry and sensitive skin, this hydrating body cream replenishes skin to improve hydration and smoothness. This body moisturizer developed with dermatologists is clinically proven to make skin feel smooth and quenched, leaving it beautifully supple while helping to maintain skin’s moisture balance by continuously releasing hydration. The refreshing, ultra-light gel-cream formula is fragrance-free and contains hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in skin, that binds to water and holds it within the skin’s surface for smoother skin. The non-greasy full body cream absorbs instantly and is oil-, dye-, alcohol-, paraben-, and fragrance-free. Use body gel daily to retain hydration and help improve the look and feel of dry skin over time. Discover the full Neutrogena Hydro Boost skin care line.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Gel Cream Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Gel Cream instantly quenches thirsty skin. Designed for daily use on dry and sensitive skin, this hydrating body cream replenishes skin to improve hydration and smoothness. From the number-one Hyaluronic Acid platform, this body gel cream developed with dermatologists is clinically proven* to make skin feel smooth and quenched, leaving it beautifully supple. The refreshing, lightweight formula boosts skin hydrating and then locks it in. The non-greasy body cream absorbs instantly and is oil-, dye-, alcohol-, and paraben-free. Use daily to retain hydration and help improve the look and feel of dry skin over time.

INSTANTLY QUENCHES Instantly quenches for clinically proven* supple, hydrated skin. ULTRALIGHT FORMULA Fast-absorbing, ultralight, non-greasy, paraben-free formula from a dermatologist-recommended brand. FORMULATED WITH HYALURONIC ACID Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid to help keep skin feeling hydrated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrates. Softens skin. Necessary.
reviews.reviewText: This is the best lotion I have ever used. It is non-greasy, super absorbent and has a very soft scent of nothing. This does not feel like a lotion. It feels more like moisturizer in air form. My first Neutrogena product. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Moisturizing Gel Cream - Hydration Revolution
reviews.reviewText: I recently discovered the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Moisturizing Gel Cream with Hyaluronic Acid, and it has become a game-changer in my skincare routine. This non-greasy formula offers a level of hydration that truly sets it apart from other body creams.One of the standout features of this moisturizing gel cream is its use of hyaluronic acid. Known for its incredible ability to retain moisture, hyaluronic acid leaves my skin feeling supple, soft, and deeply hydrated. The lightweight gel consistency is perfect for those who dislike the heavy or sticky feeling that some body creams can leave behind.What I appreciate most is the non-greasy formula. The gel cream effortlessly absorbs into the skin, leaving no residue or slick feeling. It's a relief to find a moisturizer that provides intense hydration without the drawbacks of greasiness. I can apply it in the morning and trust that my skin will stay moisturized throughout the day.The fragrance is subtle and refreshing, adding a pleasant touch without being overwhelming. It's suitable for those with sensitive skin, as I've experienced no irritation or discomfort after regular use.The packaging is practical, allowing for easy dispensing and ensuring that I can use every last bit of this fantastic product. The blue color and sleek design also make it visually appealing.In conclusion, the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Moisturizing Gel Cream is a hydrating powerhouse that has earned a permanent spot in my skincare routine. If you're in search of a non-greasy, deeply moisturizing body cream with the added benefits of hyaluronic acid, look no further. This product delivers on its promises and leaves your skin feeling refreshed, revitalized, and beautifully moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing and Hydrating - Great for Face Too!
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Moisturizing Gel Cream, and it has been a delightful experience. The gel-cream formula is infused with hyaluronic acid, known for its hydrating properties. One of the highlights for me is its refreshingly light texture, which makes it exceptionally comfortable to apply not just on the body but on the face as well. Unlike some heavier moisturizers, it doesn't leave a greasy residue, making it perfect for my daily skincare routine. The hydration it offers is impressive – it keeps my skin feeling moisturized throughout the day without the need for frequent reapplication. If you're looking for a moisturizer that feels light yet provides effective hydration, this product is definitely worth trying. Highly recommended for those who prefer a non-greasy, refreshing feel in their skincare products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hand model recommended! Exquisite. Miracle.
reviews.reviewText: Get it. You won’t regret it.It never feels sticky or tacky. It is fragrance free. It does its job. My skin drinks it in. My hands love it. My feet love it. My elbows love it. It makes my skin feel healthy, nourished, and well-cared for. It’s just luscious. You’ll feel so pampered.I keep a small plain squeeze bottle in my purse and whenever I share it with someone the first thing they say is “Ooooooooh what is THIS stuff?”In my younger days I was a hand model and believe me, I have tried a lot (…a LOT) of lotions over the years. I am VERY picky. I need a daily lotion that isn’t sticky, tacky, waxy, shiny or greasy, and one that my skin actually likes. My go-to has always been Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair. (I still LOVE that one, it’s so great.) Having felt I’d found the perfect formula for my skin, I never thought I’d want to try another brand, let alone switch brands, but I had an opportunity to try this Neutrogena Hydro Boost about 3 years ago - and have been using it ever since! It just feels like the perfect balance of moisture and softness. It absorbs quickly. Apply it anytime. Use as much or as little as your skin needs.. Just, try it one time, you’ll see. . —- I love it. I truly do. —-Plus, it’s “Nurtrogena” c’mon. It’s a great brand - and they don’t add dyes, perfumes, or oils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Scent is strong, otherwise, the cream is moisturizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most moisturizing gel ever
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best gel/cream I have ever used. I apply the gel on my legs and arms in the morning.The gel absorbs quickly and my skin feels moisturized the entire day. The consistency is unique, silk like feel. Well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lotion!
reviews.reviewText: Love the creamy gel moisturizer! Not sticky , light weight and it does the job !I have purchased this twice so far from Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dry skin bye bye!
reviews.reviewText: I live in a very dry climate and lotion is a must have. I have tried every lotion out there for dry skin but no more. This is one I plan on sticking with, no more test dummy here. This has done wonders for my skin. My skin is so soft, the lotion is not greasy or does not feel like you have a thick layer of cream on you. It absorbs wonderful and it feels like you just gave you skin a drink of water. Thumbs up!
Tiene una consistencia muy ligera y hidrata muy bien
It's not oily yet feels immediately absorbed & moisturized.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not nearly as good as Neutrogena Deep Moisture Body Lotion
reviews.reviewText: I found this product very disappointing. It baffles me that Neutrogena seems to have discontinued their Deep Moisture Body Lotion which was far superior in my experience.The Hydro Boost gel did not help at all with dry, irritated skin - whereas I could rely on the Deep Moisture Lotion to soothe irritated skin and maintain skin in good condtion

reviews.reviewTitle: 乾燥敏感肌にいいです
reviews.reviewText: 敏感肌ですが、全身と顔使っても問題ないです、香りも好きです。

A pesar de ser para el cuerpo lo empece a usar en la cara y me gusto mas que la versión para el rostro! Me encanta que no tiene aroma porque tengo el olfato muy sensible. Rinde muchísimo porque se esparce fácilmente y se ocupa muy poco producto. Me alegra haberlo probado y definitivamente comprare otro antes de que este se termine.
